alert.note: Alert for Morrow; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:32PM EDT until May 21 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RICHLAND AND EASTERN MORROW COUNTIES... At 432 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chesterville, or near Mount Gilead, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Mount Gilead, Shelby, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline, Bellville, Chesterville, Lucas, Edison and Shauck. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
